description: A woman sits reading in a room. Through an open door, a personified red recliner, grandfather clock, and lamp are entering. Each piece of furniture possesses a smiling face and small limbs, suggesting they have been out and are returning home. This depicts an absurd domestic situation where inanimate objects have lives independent of their human owner. The scene presents a surreal inversion of roles between people and their possessions.
caption: “Well, we’re back!”
